deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"49f09048cf242d1a50ee3e8c8ab065627b1b24a0","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"CRITICAL FIX: Correct ARM template configuration for bot authentication

- Remove ipSecurityRestrictions that blocked all Teams traffic
- Change default action from Deny to Allow to prevent traffic blocking
- Fix msaAppType from SingleTenant to MultiTenant to match Azure AD App Registration
- This resolves both message reception and bot reply authentication issues
- Prevents future deployments from breaking Teams connectivity

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>"}
